about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Software Engineering student at Universidad de Santander, with a focus on agile methodologies, team management, and full-stack web architectures.
about.paragraph2: I work autonomously on international freelance projects, from conception to deployment, translating business requirements into effective technical solutions.

process.title: How I approach a project
process.subtitle: Flow I follow from first contact to production deployment.
process.phase1_desc: Initial meeting with the client: context, goals and initial project scope.
process.phase2_desc: Identifying functional and non-functional needs, users and use cases.
process.phase3_desc: Prioritisation, refinement and agreement with the client before design.
process.phase4_desc: Architecture, UX/UI and technical plan: stack, sprints and acceptance criteria.
process.phase5_desc: Iterative implementation with code review and incremental deliveries.
process.phase6_desc: Functional testing, integration and validation with the client (UAT).
process.phase7_desc: Production release, monitoring and post-launch support.

demo.responsiveDesc: This same page adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop.

demo.responsiveDesktopHint: On desktop: 3 columns and full layout.
demo.responsiveTip: Drag the slider or pick a size to see how the layout changes by width (typical breakpoints: 768px, 1024px).
demo.desktopHeroText: Full layout example with sections, text and images that adapt to the available space.
demo.desktopFeatureDesc: Short description of the service or feature.
demo.desktopAboutText: Sample text for a section. Content reflows by width: on desktop it uses the full space with flexible columns and containers.
demo.blockContent1: Section content. Title and text that adapt to the width.
demo.blockContent2: Short description of services or block features.
demo.blockContent3: Form or contact links. Each block simulates a section.
demo.formsDesc: Real-time validation, clear error messages and success feedback. Focus on UX and accessibility.

demo.formsTip: Try leaving fields empty or with invalid data to see error messages.
demo.perfDesc: Before: everything loads at once. After: lazy loading for images and deferred section loading.
